messages.subject: Escaping one's parents
messages.msgSnippet:
You can t keep him any longer than he s willing to be there.  Two of my 
friends killed themselves, one at 14, one at
messages.messageBody:
<<<< He is not allowed to test us... >>

You can't keep him any longer than he's willing to be there. Two of my
friends killed themselves, one at 14, one at 15. Many people I've known
have
run away. They would rather sleep in an alley in a scary city than stay
with
their overbearing parents.>>

I have watched several families who raised their children with this
strict and overbearing mindset. When the children were able to leave
they did and lost all control.

Sandra posted on this, I think. They have had no practice thinking for
themselves and they seem to think that if they aren't "obedient" in every
way they must be totally "forsaken".

The parents, in all cases, decided that Satan had just "gotten" them.

Kris
